## Shape.TopCM property

Represents the vertical offset of shape from its top row, in unit of centimeters.

```csharp
public double TopCM { get; set; }
```

### Examples

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.TopCM == 3)
    shape.TopCM = 1;
```
